name: Advanced Materials
effects: Increase the durability of the armor by +25% (round up).

name: Audio Suite
effects: Gain +3 Skill Levels on Vigilance checks when it's about hearing. The suite also allows you to filter sounds and set up an encrypted network of communication with others within 10km.

name: Battery Extension
effects: Triples the duration of the power armor's battery.

name: Diamantine Mesh
effects: Adds +2 Soak against melee attacks and plasma projectiles.

name: Droppack
effects: Can be activated once to reduce the distance class of a fall by 10. After use, it requires at least 5 Minutes to recharge.

name: Emergency Systems
effects: The armor and its mods remain operable even when durability is 0.

name: Reflective Coating
effects: Negates the armor penetration of lasers.

name: Sealed
effects: The armor gains the Vacuum-Sealed quality and becomes usable in space by protecting against the dangers of vacuum, while providing life support for several hours.

name: Servos
effects: The user gains +2 Speed and a +1 pool bonus on melee and defense checks.

name: Shock Absorber
effects: Adds +2 Soak against explosions and falling damage.

name: State-of-the-Art
effects: Increase the durability of the armor by +50% (round up). Cannot be combined with the Advanced Materials.

name: Stealth Coating
effects: Allows the armor's texture to mimick the environment and reduce heat profiles, providing the user with a +5 pool on attempts to stay hidden visually.

name: Visual Enhancer
effects: Gain +3 Skill Levels on Vigilance checks when it's about seeing something. The suite also allows zooming, video recording and similar perks.
